item.title: Madhulika Badanpet
item.description: About me I have worked at Uber as a Client Platform Engineer for 2 1/2 years, focusing on macOS, Windows and Linux end points. I am always open to learning as much as I can and working together to solve complex problems. Experience Chef Windows macOS Linux Contact Me LinkedIn GitHub
